name: Ball Bouncer (iLexxeLi)
description:
Welcome to BALL BOUNCER!

This game is about two balls which need to link "TOGETHER".
Here is the kicker... You control both balls at the same time!
What you do to one ball you do to the other. 

This is a simple puzzle game which was put together in 48 hrs for the Kiwijam22. 

Enjoy!
